Name: MDX_Sales_Group
Expression: {UNION(FILTER(EXCEPT(TM1SUBSETALL([SLS_CUSTOMER]) , {[SLS_CUSTOMER].[N/A_CUSTOMER]}) , [SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER((("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME)) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Group])) , FILTER(EXCEPT(TM1SUBSETALL([SLS_CUSTOMER]) , {[SLS_CUSTOMER].[N/A_CUSTOMER]}) , [SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = "Multiple Sales Group"))}
